items.title: Carlyle Group hunts for wealth assets in India alongside rivals
items.description: The New-York based firm that counts PNB Housing Finance Ltd. and Yes Bank Ltd. in its India portfolio, is keen to acquire wealth and asset management companies as local households move their savings toward financial assets.

items.title: Adani’s new $2.1 billion Mumbai airport draws low-cost carriers
items.description: IndiGo will shift part of its operations to the new airport, according to people familiar with the matter. Tata Group’s low-cost carrier Air India Express and smaller rivals SpiceJet and Akasa are also in discussions to eventually relocate all of their operations.

items.title: Commodity trader Cargill to add 500 jobs to its Indian global centres in 3 years
items.description: The Minneapolis-based firm has two GCCs in India, with most of the tech operations running out of Bengaluru while Gurugram centre focusses on finance and human resource functions

items.title: CCI approves acquisition of up to 72.8% stake in Orient Cement by Ambuja Cements
items.description: The proposed transaction is a two-stage acquisition process, initiated through two share purchase agreements (SPAs) on October 22, 2024, will see Ambuja Cements initially acquiring a 46.80% stake in Orient Cement

items.title: Adani Wilmar to acquire GD Foods, owner of prominent FMCG brand 'Tops'
items.description: The acquisition of GD Foods aligns with Adani Wilmar's vision to enlarge offerings and build a formidable presence in the value-added segment over time, MD & CEO Angshu Mallick said.

items.title: Cochin Shipyard: Growth prospects brighten amid capacity expansion
items.description: The focus is on expanding capabilities to manage larger and more technologically advanced vessels

items.title: Lemon Tree Hotels: A quality listed stock to play the mid-market hotel theme
items.description: The hotelier plans to significantly reduce debt, which should drive valuation re-rating

items.title: Should one bet on Prudent after the sharp fall?
items.description: The fall in equity markets and consequent MTM loss, no doubt, are key concerns. However, factors like healthy earnings visibility, an asset-light business model, and high operating leverage show that there is still promise
